onlylive.label: Only when live (ALL FUNCTIONS)
onlylive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live.

command.label: Command name
command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

EnabledDiscord.label: Let !store commands be used in Discord
EnabledDiscord.tooltip: If checked, users will be able to use the !store in discord. Whisper settings will still be followed.

StoreInfoWhisp.label: Send !store info response as a whisper
StoreInfoWhisp.tooltip: If checked, !store info responses will be sent in a whisper, rather than in chat

StoreHelpWhisp.label: Send !store help response as a whisper
StoreHelpWhisp.tooltip: If checked, !store help responses will be sent in a whisper, rather than in chat

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set a minimum permission level required to use the store!

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set a minimum rank, points, hours, or specific user here

castercd.label: Caster ignores cooldown
castercd.tooltip: If checked the broadcaster ignore cooldowns!

usecd.label: Use cooldown message
usecd.tooltip: Check this box to display cooldown messages

HelpCooldown.label: Use a cooldown with the !store help function
HelpCooldown.tooltip: Check this box if you want to the !store help function to follow the cooldown settings

oncooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
oncooldown.label: Cooldown response
oncooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

timerUserCooldown.label: User cooldown (seconds)
timerUserCooldown.tooltip:
User Cooldown timer in seconds.
Not yet functional for !store buy

onusercooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
onusercooldown.label: User cooldown response
onusercooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

purchaseallow.label: Enable store purchases
purchaseallow.tooltip: Useful for allowing setup without allowing viewers to buy from the store

StoreBuyWhisp.label: Allow items to be bought via whisper
StoreBuyWhisp.tooltip: If ticked, viewers will be able to send a whisper to the bot to buy items. Announcements of successful purchase will also be sent as a whisper

atsdefaultcost.label: Default item cost
atsdefaultcost.tooltip: This value will be used for items created in chat with default cost selected

StoreAddPermission.label: Store add/edit permission level
StoreAddPermission.tooltip: Set a minimum permission level required to add items to the store. The edit function follows this setting as well

StoreAddPermissionInfo.label: Store add/edit permission level info
StoreAddPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set a minimum rank, points, hours, or specific user here

DeleteOnRedeemCode.label: Auto delete code type items
DeleteOnRedeemCode.tooltip:
Code type items will be automatically deleted when purchased.
DELETING ITEMS CANNOT BE UNDONE

StoreDelEnable.label: Enable !store delete function.
StoreDelEnable.tooltip:
DELETING CANNOT BE UNDONE. TAKE EXTREME CAUTION USING THIS FUNCTION
Only tick this box if you understand the risks associated with it!

StoreDelPermission.label: Store delete permission level info
StoreDelPermission.tooltip:
Set a minimum permission level required to permanently delete items from the store.
DELETING CANNOT BE UNDONE. TAKE EXTREME CAUTION USING THIS FUNCTION

StoreDelPermissionInfo.label: Store delete permission level info
StoreDelPermissionInfo.tooltip:
Set a minimum rank, points, hours, or specific user here
DELETING CANNOT BE UNDONE. TAKE EXTREME CAUTION USING THIS FUNCTION

stf.label: Enable store log
stf.tooltip: If enabled all purchases will be saved to the log!

StoreLogPermission.label: Store log permission level
StoreLogPermission.tooltip: Set a minimum permission level required to access the store log

StoreLogPermissionInfo.label: Store log permission level info
StoreLogPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set a minimum rank, points, hours, or specific user here

textline.label: Store log format
textline.tooltip:
Format of lines saved to the textfile upon successful purchase. 
{0} = user 
{1} = Item name
{2} = Item cost
{3} = currencyname
{4} = Date & Time

InvPermission.label: Inventory reset permission level
InvPermission.tooltip: Set a minimum permission level required to reset inventory for a player or the full system

InvPermissionInfo.label: Store log permission level info
InvPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set a minimum rank, points, hours, or specific user here

StoreListEnable.label: Enable Store List
StoreListEnable.tooltip: Users will be able to use the list function to view a range of items simultaneously

StoreListWhisp.label: Send !store list response as a whisper
StoreListWhisp.tooltip: If checked, !store list responses will be sent in a whisper, rather than in chat

StoreListNumber.label: Items per page
StoreListNumber.tooltip: Sets amount of items shown per page of the list

StoreListShowDisabled.label: Show disabled items in the list
StoreListShowDisabled.tooltip: If enabled, items that are disabled will be shown in the list.

StoreListShowAll.label: Show all items in one page
StoreListShowAll.tooltip: If enabled, the '!store list all' command will become available, and it will show all items as one page

SLSAusage.label: Usage for !store list all
SLSAusage.tooltip: Set where the command can be used for listing all items

StoreListMessage.value: Format = Item Name (itemID, item cost). {0}. Page {1}/{2}
StoreListMessage.label: List response
StoreListMessage.tooltip:
The response with the list.
{0} = list of items
{1} = current page
{2} = maximum page count

StoreListFormat.label: List format
StoreListFormat.tooltip:
The format of each item in the list.
{0} = item name
{1} = item ID
{2} = item cost
{3} = item type
{4} = item setting (enabled or disabled)

enableSounds.label: Enable sounds
enableSounds.tooltip: If enabled, sounds will play on successful purchase of an item. If a sound has been assigned to an item, it will overwrite all UI settings

randomSounds.label: Play random sounds
randomSounds.tooltip: If enabled, a sound will be randomly chosen from the sounds folder to be played

soundFile.label: Sound File
soundFile.tooltip:
Sound must be stored in the sounds folder to successfully play.
Must be a .mp3 file
This sound will be played if no sound is assigned to the item being purchased

volume.label: volume
volume.tooltip: Sets volume for sfx to be played at

respNotLive.value: Sorry {0}, but the stream must be live in order to use that command.
respNotLive.label: Stream not live
respNotLive.tooltip:
Message that will display if user attempts to use the command while stream is not live. 
 {0} = User

info.value: {0} -> Use [{1} info <#>] to learn about an item, or [{1} buy <#>] to buy an item!
info.label: Need more info
info.tooltip:
Response when user doesn't specify what item to buy 
{0} = user

itempurchasesuccess.label: Item purchase success
itempurchasesuccess.tooltip:
Response when a user successfully buys an item! 
{0} = user 
{1} = Item Name 
{2} = Item Cost 
{3} = Points name

notenough.value: {0} -> you don't have the {1} {2} required to buy this item.
notenough.label: Not enough points
notenough.tooltip:
Response when user doesn't have enough currency. 
{0} = user 
{1} = purchase cost
{2} = currencyname
{3} = user points

notavailable.label: Item doesn't exist
notavailable.tooltip:
Response when user tries to buy an item that isn't available 
{0} = user 
{1} = item user tried to buy

notenabled.label: Item disabled
notenabled.tooltip:
Response when user tries to buy an item that is disabled 
{0} = user 
{1} = item user tried to buy

notperm.value: {0} -> you don't have permission to use this command. permission is: [{1} / {2}]
notperm.label: Not permitted
notperm.tooltip:
Message to send when the user permission doesn't match command permission 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

quantitytoolow.value: {0} -> there aren't any remaining copies of item {1}
quantitytoolow.label: Quantity of item too low
quantitytoolow.tooltip:
Message to send when an item has ran out of copies 
{0} = user 
{1} = item user tried to buy

incorrectusage.value: {0} -> That command is designated for use in the following location: {1}
incorrectusage.label: Store info success
incorrectusage.tooltip:
Response with item information chosen by user 
{0} = User 
{1} = Usage setting

listbase.value: There are currently {0} items in the store. Use [{1} info <#>] to learn about an item, or [{1} buy <#>] to buy an item
listbase.label: !store message
listbase.tooltip:
The message shown before listing the items when using !store, without any parameters 
{0} = user
{1} = command name

atssuccess.label: Add to store successful
atssuccess.tooltip:
Message sent to chat when '!store add' has succeeded 
{0} = user 
{1} = Item Name
{2} = Item ID

atsfailed.label: Add to store failed
atsfailed.tooltip: Message sent to chat when '!store add' has failed

storeinfosuccess.label: Store info success
storeinfosuccess.tooltip:
Response with item information chosen by user 
{0} = User 
{1} = Item Name 
{2} = Item Type 
{3} = Item ID 
{4} = Item Cost 
{5} = Points Name

StoreDelMsg.value: Item {0} has been successfully deleted by {1}
StoreDelMsg.label: Store delete success
StoreDelMsg.tooltip:
Response to confirm that an item has been deleted permanently
{0} = ItemID
{1} = user

InvMsg.value: {0}, the following items are in your inventory: {1}
InvMsg.label: Inventory Report
InvMsg.tooltip:
Response to default '!store inventory' command that has list of items the user has
{0} = user
{1} = list of items

EggsEnabled.label: Super secret easter eggs!
EggsEnabled.tooltip: See if you can find them all! The prize is your sense of accomplishment

helpmessageGeneral.value: The available parameters for [{1} help function] are add, buy, delete, info, list, log, edit, and toggle
helpmessageGeneral.label: General

helpmessageBuy.value: {0} -> Use [{1} buy #] to purchase an item. If the item has the 'contribute' type, you can put an amount to pay after specifying the item number
helpmessageBuy.label: Buying an item

helpmessageInfo.value: {0} -> Use [{1} info #] to get a detailed information message about item #!
helpmessageInfo.label: Info Function

helpmessageList.value: Use [{1} list page] to see a collection of items at once, with their name, item number, and cost
helpmessageList.label: List Function

helpmessageAdd.value: [{1} add <ItemType> cost/default/dflt ItemName]. Add an item for viewers to purchase with {2}! You can also use [{1} toggle] to enable/disable an existing item in the store. Use {0} help add [general/once/code/contribute/unique] for more information.
helpmessageAdd.label: Adding an item

helpmessageAddGeneral.value: [{1} add general cost/default ItemName] Use this function to add items that can be bought multiple times
helpmessageAddGeneral.label: Adding a general type item

helpmessageAddContribute.value: [{1} add contribute cost/default ItemName] Use this function to add items that can everyone can work together to purchase. Can also use 'ctb' as a short form for contribute
helpmessageAddContribute.label: Adding a 'contribute' type item

helpmessageAddUnique.value: [{1} add unique cost/default ItemName] Use this function to add items that can only be purchased once per user.
helpmessageAddUnique.label: Adding a 'unique' type item

helpmessageOnce.value: [{1} add once cost/default ItemName] Use this function to add items that can only be purchased once
helpmessageOnce.label: Adding a 'once' type item

helpmessageSession.value: [{1} add session <cost/default> <ItemName>] Use this function to add items that can only be purchased once per session. A session ends when the script is restarted, or the bot is closed.
helpmessageSession.label: Adding a 'session' type item

helpmessageAddCode.value: [{1} add code <cost/default> <ItemCode> <ItemName>] use this function to add items that contain a code, so the bot can send a whisper containing the code. Code items can only be purchased once
helpmessageAddCode.label: General

helpmessageAddCode2.value: Make sure there are no spaces in the ItemCode, or it won't save properly!
helpmessageAddCode2.label: Adding a 'code' type item. Item code warning

helpmessageLog.value: When you use [{1} log #], it will load the last # entries, and post them in chat. If no number is given, it will load the last 10 entries. If # is higher than the amount of entries, the bot will load as many as it can before returning an error message.
helpmessageLog.label: Log function

helpmessageToggle.value: Use [{1} toggle #] to enable or disable the purchase of an existing item! Useful if you have a once-off item that you want to make available, or you don't want a general item to be purchased for whatever reason
helpmessageToggle.label: Toggle function

helpmessageEdit.value: [{1} edit <itemID> <DataType> <#>]. <DataType> can be an item's name, cost, permission, cooldown, or code
helpmessageEdit.label: Edit function

helpmessageDelete.value: Use [{1} delete #] to completely remove an item from the system, and allow another item to take its item ID. Once deleted, it can't be undone, so use with caution!
helpmessageDelete.label: Delete function

openfolder.label: Open Script Directory
openfolder.tooltip: Opens the folder for this script

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

OpenLog.label: Open Store Log
OpenLog.tooltip: Opens file recording all successful purchases

ResetLog.label: Reset Store Log
ResetLog.tooltip:
Resets file recording all successful purchases.
CANNOT BE UNDONE

setdefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
setdefaults.tooltip: Restores all script settings to the default ones!
